query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mercados_unicos) as total_mercados,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clientes) as total_clientes,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM concorrentes) as total_concorrentes,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM leads) as total_leads

  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clientes) as total_clientes,
